column15:

column16: Nycil Germ Expert Classic Prickly Heat Powder is used for providing visible relief from issues like sweat, body odour, itching, rashes and prickly heat in just three days. With over 50 years of expertise, Nycil remains a leading brand in the prickly heat and cooling powder category in India, offering long-lasting freshness and protection.
column17:
Starch: It is a natural absorbent that effectively soaks up excess moisture from the skin, managing the discomfort caused by sweat. Its drying properties help keep the skin fresh and manage the accumulation of germs and bacteria in humid conditions.
 
Zinc Oxide: It is known for its soothing and protective properties. It helps calm irritated skin, manages redness and creates a barrier that manages rashes and further irritation. Its antimicrobial qualities ensure protection against skin infections.
 
Chlorphenesin: It is a potent antibacterial agent that helps eliminate harmful microbes responsible for skin issues like rashes, itching and prickly heat. It plays a key role in maintaining healthy and germ-free skin, especially during summer.
 
Purified Talc: It provides a smooth, cooling effect on the skin. It reduces friction and minimises irritation caused by excessive sweating. By keeping the skin dry and comfortable, it manages prickly heat and other summer skin discomforts.
column18:
Relieves Prickly Heat and Summer Rashes: It is specifically designed to manage prickly heat and summer skin rashes. Its unique antibacterial formula targets the microbes responsible for irritation and helps provide quick relief from redness and discomfort.
 
Reduces Excessive Sweating and Body Odour: The powder absorbs excess moisture and neutralises body odour caused by sweat, keeping you fresh and dry throughout the day. This makes it ideal for use in hot and humid climates.
 
Soothes Itching and Skin Irritation: With the soothing properties of Zinc Oxide, Nycil helps calm itching and irritation caused by sweat or summer heat. It forms a protective layer over the skin to prevent further discomfort.
 
Manages Germ Build-Up: Enriched with Chlorphenesin, an effective antibacterial agent, the powder provides instant germ-killing action. It protects the skin from harmful microbes that can lead to rashes, infections or prickly heat.
 
Promotes Skin Cooling and Comfort: The presence of Purified Talc ensures a cooling effect on the skin, offering immediate relief from the heat. It keeps the skin soft, smooth and comfortable, even after long exposure to the sun.
column19: Sprinkle powder on the affected area 3-4 times a day or as directed by the physician.

Keep out of the reach of children.

column11: Indulekha Bringha Oil 100ml is used for managing hair fall. It is a formulation of Bringhraj, Svetakutaja, Amla and virgin coconut oil. It is an Ayurvedic remedy that helps reduce hair loss and support hair growth. This  Ayurvedic oil, which contains Bhringraj and ten other herbs, helps revitalise the roots and supports the growth of new hair.

column16: Indulekha Bringha Oil 100ml is used for managing hair fall. It is a formulation of Bringhraj, Svetakutaja, Amla and virgin coconut oil. It is an Ayurvedic remedy that helps reduce hair loss and support hair growth. This  Ayurvedic oil, which contains Bhringraj and ten other herbs, helps revitalise the roots and supports the growth of new hair.
column17:
Bringhraj: It is one of the key ingredients for herbal preparations used in the management of hair loss due to its antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and anti-allergic properties. It also helps manage hair fall and greying of hair.
 
Svetakutaja: It is an ingredient renowned for its anti-dandruff properties due to its moisturising, anti-microbial, and anti-inflammatory characteristics. For the same reasons, it helps to avoid various scalp skin-related conditions.
 
Amla: It helps strengthen the hair follicles, allowing for rapid growth. Furthermore, it helps eliminate germs, dirt, and bacteria from the scalp, keeping it cleaner and healthier. It may help slow the greying of hair and enhance colour retention. 
 
Virgin Coconut Oil: It helps hydrate and moisturise the hair, ensuring that it remains soft, shining, and moisturised. It can be really helpful for increasing hair length. It helps to keep the hair moisturised and may help reduce hair damage. It also reduces protein loss and helps protect the hair against wind, sun, and smoke.
column18:
Hair Fall Reduction: The Indulekha hair oil is a potent Ayurvedic preparation that can help manage hair loss. This hair oil is made from natural ingredients that may help reduce hair loss, to support less shedding and healthier roots with daily usage.
 
Supports New Hair Growth: Indulekha Bringha Hair Oil's potency stems from its potent blend of ingredients, which not only helps reduce hair loss but also helps stimulate new hair development. This is accomplished through the nurturing effects of its essential ingredients, such as Bringha and Amla, which are well-known in Ayurvedic research for their hair growth benefits.
 
Provides Essential Nourishment: This premium Indulekha Bringha Hair Oil has a combination of natural nutrients like virgin coconut oil, Amla, and Bringha. These ingredients work together to penetrate deep into the scalp and give the nutrients required for healthy hair development.
 
Helps Nourish Hair: The virgin coconut oil and aloe vera in this oil work as a natural conditioner, penetrating deep into the hair shafts to provide powerful hydration and nourishment. This leads to softer, smoother, and shinier hair over time.
column19:
For best results, use three times each week for four months. 
After applying the oil, wait 3-4 hours before rinsing it out with Indulekha Bringha Shampoo.
column20:
Read the label carefully before use.
Keep it out of the reach of children.
For external use only.
Store in a cool and dry place away from direct sunlight
column21:
Good to Know
Free from silicones: Silicone damages hair by blocking nourishing ingredients from penetrating deep into the hair follicle. Trichup Hair Fall Control Oil does not contain silicones.
 
Paraben-free: Parabens are chemicals that are commonly used as preservatives in cosmetic and pharmaceutical products. This product does not contain parabens or other chemicals.
 
Synthetic perfume free: It does not contain any added fragrances which may irritate the skin.
 
Sulphate-free: This product is free from harsh sulphates that can strip the skin of its natural oils and cause irritation.
Quick Tips
Leave Trichup Hair Oil overnight on the scalp and hair for effective nourishment.
Massage the scalp with fingers in a circular motion to evenly distribute the oil and enhance blood flow to the scalp.
Always part the hair to ensure oil reaches the scalp.
Wash your hair regularly to keep the scalp clean.
Avoid scratching the scalp. Instead, massage gently to reduce itchiness
Use clean combs and brushes.
Concerns It Can Help With
Hair fall
Hair growth 
Scalp health
